data.title: Technology Innovation Institute on LinkedIn: Happy International Women’s Day to our amazing women who achieve…
data.meta_description: Happy International Women’s Day to our amazing women who achieve incredible breakthroughs everyday!
data.text:
TII is leading the development of technologies that drive innovation in environment preserving solutions globally, in support of the Abu Dhabi Environmental Centennial 2071. This initiative is designed to shape the future and establish a foundation for the next 50 years, positioning Abu Dhabi as a global leader in environmental conservation and helping the UAE achieve its vision. Our research centers are at the forefront of groundbreaking advancements, including enhancing precision and efficiency in planting crops with robotics, optimizing farming practices through precision agriculture robotics, and using nanodrones to monitor crop health for timely interventions. We employ SAR (Synthetic Aperture Radar) for analyzing soil properties and seeding quality, rain-triggering lasers to induce rainfall in arid regions, and proteins for carbon capture to reduce greenhouse gases. Additionally, we develop cooling coatings for greenhouses to regulate temperatures for improved plant growth, anti-soiling coatings to enhance solar panel efficiency, and waste repurposing technologies to transform waste into valuable resources. Our work also includes AI for optimizing crop management and environmental monitoring, and underwater technologies to protect marine resources, amongst other technologies. By advancing these eco-friendly solutions, we are not only improving the quality of life for our ecosystem but also paving the way for Abu Dhabi to achieve the UAE's Green Agenda 2030 and Net Zero 2050 goals, ensuring a sustainable and prosperous future. #Sustainability #Innovation #GreenAgenda2030 #NetZero2050

Has academic cryptography over-promised and under-delivered? Join us at the Glowing Hot Topics in Cryptography (GHTC) 2024 workshop on August 17th at the University of Santa Barbara, California, hosted by TII. Engage in dynamic discussions, debate real-world applications, and push the boundaries of cryptographic research. GHTC is an affiliate event of CRYPTO2024, running from August 18-22. Stay tuned for more details! Save the date and register by visiting the link: https://lnkd.in/dgNHiR9c To learn more visit: https://lnkd.in/dEGwavRC #TII #Innovation #Technology #Cryptography #GHTC

Autonomous solutions are revolutionizing reality. At TII, we have been at the forefront of this revolution, pioneering breakthroughs in unmanned autonomous vehicles (land, air, and sea), high performance autonomous stacks, biorobotics, development of advanced sensors and payloads, zero trust architectures, and secure and resilient flight controllers. And now, our work is being further empowered by the newly established Smart and Autonomous Systems Council. From search and rescue missions and precision agriculture to environmental monitoring and autonomous racing, our advancements are setting new standards in innovation—and thanks to these efforts, a smarter, more autonomous and secure future has never been more within our grasp. #AutonomousSolutions #Robotics #Innovation #Technology #TII #AbuDhabi #SmartSystems #FutureTech

The genetic secrets of seaweed multicellularity have been unlocked, thanks to the groundbreaking research conducted by Dr. Alexandra Mystikou, Ph.D. Lead Researcher at TII and her colleagues at NYUAD. If you're scratching your head right now, don't worry—here's everything you need to know about this remarkable discovery. Find out more by reading the article: https://lnkd.in/gdEa8HE8 #TIIUAE #Seaweed #Multicellularity #Discovery #Genomics

At TII, we're diving into the cutting-edge field of Atomtronics, where we manipulate ultra-cold atoms to create highly efficient circuits for quantum simulation and quantum sensing. Atomtronics contributes to bridging the gap between fundamental quantum science and the real world, helping to bring quantum technologies to life. In particular, our work could improve tools to sense rotations with high precision and for accurate navigation. Join us as we explore these exciting innovations. #TII #Innovation #Technology #Atomtronics #QRC

We are proud to announce DERC's significant participation at GlobalEm 2024, showcasing our cutting-edge research and innovations. Our dedicated team of researchers will present groundbreaking studies on diverse topics, from advanced high-power electromagnetic systems and pulsed power generators to innovative applications of artificial intelligence and metalens technology. These pioneering efforts underline our commitment to solving global challenges in sustainability, healthcare, defense, and communication through technological advancements. Join us in celebrating these achievements and exploring the future of electromagnetic research. Discover more about our work and how we're shaping the future of technology at: https://lnkd.in/dsGzA_8S #TII #Innovation #Technology #DERC #GlobalEm2024 #Research
